attributes.title: THIS IS TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. There was child pornography all over it and it was just a bad a in general. Like there was so many glitch and bugs in it. I CANNOT BELIEVE THIS. I don’t understand why Donald Trump would put such a horrible app in stores.

attributes.title: One star is all that this clown deserves
attributes.review: I hate this app. Not only does it support the grossest man alive but it also has a terrible format. The music was enough to make me want to claw my ears off but the American flag in the background was so tacky that I wanted to throw my phone. Frick trump and frick this app. 😡

attributes.title: 🙈LauV 🥖 laFf🥵 LauV 🙈
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and its complete GARBAGE 🗑 💅 It made my phone lag and took for EVER to download 😾😾😾 I waited WEEKS for it to download and when it finally opened it literally just BROKE my phone. It started glitching kept asking for my location etc etc just NO 🥖👹

attributes.title: Garbage App
attributes.review: Abysmal doesn’t even begin to describe how terrible this app is. I don’t think there’s even a word to describe how ANYTHING BUT GREAT it is. I was overwhelmed by the amount of bugs in this thing. Like it’s literally infested y’all. YUCK. Don’t download unless you want to be utterly disgusted beyond reason

attributes.title: Orange Minions?!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to show support to the great tangerine, but it took so long to download! When if finally downloaded, it asked for my location, and a ton of little orange people flooded my apartment, telling me I had to go to the mothership! I would not recommend😾😡

attributes.title: This killed my NEIGHBOR
attributes.review:
HEAR ME OUT!!
I downloading this app 🐀✨to see the one and only 🤗orange 💅oompa🧟‍♂️ loopa🦑👘 and as soon as I hit download button🦹‍♀️ I heard I weird noise😁✨ outside so I opened my window💅 and found out😯 THERR WAS A UFO💂‍♀️👾AND then people dressed in green 😝✨grabbed 😧my neighbor💅and took him in 👹so tanks 💅to this app I have😤 one less 😩neighbor 😡

attributes.title: terrible, horrible, worst app ever!!!!
attributes.review: This app works as much as bunker boy. About 20% of the time it isn’t doing what it’s supposed to do. When I open the app, my phone starts to talk to me and can’t even finish its sentences. This app promotes fake news and is too orange for my taste. 🧚✨🧚‍♀️💕🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: Horrible experience
attributes.review: I downloaded this thinking hey maybe the conservatives are on to something HA was i badly mistaken. this app was terrible. it glitched everytime i went on it. it was also EXTREMELY OFFENSIVE. these ppl should get a job instead of running this stupid app. anyone who thinks this app is good is a CLOWN.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is the worst app out there. It is useless and keeps glitching. Honestly this app should be banned forever due to how freaking worthless it is. DO NOT download this app. It is ran by Donald Trump, but this app is 10x as trash as he is. Please make America great again by deleting this horrible app.

attributes.title: ugly 😡🤡
attributes.review: the 🍊 made a repulsive app. First off, it’s glitching my entire phone. no problem with the phone before. THEN when i opened the app, it spammed me with Rick Ashely’s “Never Gonna Give You Up”. I do not appreciate being Rick Rolled. I am absolutely disgusted, dissatisfied, and disappointed. 🤮
